goal.ch: 透過認識天文現象了解自然法則與科學探討精神。
goal.en: Through astronomical phenomena to understand the laws of nature and the spirit of scientific inquiry.

outline.ch:
密碼卡將在第一天上課（9/10）時發放。如有需要加選的同學請出席。如果加選人數過多，將抽籤決定。拿到密碼卡後要馬上註冊。
1. 認識晚上看到的星空
2. 中秋節

課程要求：
授課、小組討論及校外教學（天氣許可下在校內觀星）。
這門課學術份量重，上課時要專注，課後要花時間消化內容。
任何作弊與抄襲都是零容忍。
outline.en:
Code cards will be issued on the first day of class (9/10). For those who want to add this course, please be present. If there are too many students want to add, they will be determined by a draw lots. When one get the code card, one must register the course immediately.

Course instruction and requirement:
Lecture, subgroup discussion and extracurricular activities (stargazing when weather allows).
This course is academically oriented, attention in class is necessary, time is needed to digest the course materials.
Zero tolerance for cheating and plagiarism.

textbook.ch:
參考書：
1. “Discovering the Essential Universe” (6th edition) by Neil F. Comins (W.H. Freeman 2014)
2. “Foundations of Astronomy” (14th edition) by Michael A. Seeds and Dana Backman (Cengage Learning 2018)
3. “21st Century Astronomy” (6th edition) by Laura Kay, Stacy Palen and George Blumenthal (W. W. Norton 2019)
4. “Astronomy Today“ (9th edition) by Eric Chaisson and Steve McMillan (Pearson 2017)

gradMethod.en: midterm (30％), final exam (30％), special topic (30％), outdoor stargazing (10％), ask good questions (5％), extra essay (5％), a total of 110％
